context.p: A Product-Flavour is a unique variation of a Product-Type.
NOTE: This is only available to users with permission.
Create a new Product-Flavour within the PDU OSS Deployment Tracking Tool.

info.p: Click the Product-Flavours link in the navigation bar.
Click the Create a new Product-Flavour button.
Enter the details as shown below.
NOTE: Any restrictions on the fields are outlined.
Click the Save button, the Product-Flavour will be created, and the user will be redirected back to the view page for the newly created Product-Flavour.
NOTE: Product-Flavour will not save if any fields are invalid (invalid fields are highlighted in red).

result.p: A New Product-Flavour is created in the PDU OSS Deployment Tracking Tool.
